basic.description: This course is designed to develop professional skills that expand on a student's existing technical and non- technical skills, as relevant to a future career in engineering. The topics covered will encompass aspects of project management; leadership and crisis management; written and oral communication; engineering integrity and ethics; and social responsibility. A key feature of the course will be the use of a simulation game in project management for both instruction and assessment. This course is open only to MEng students.  PREREQUISITE: Permission of the instructor.
basic.subject: MECH
basic.title: Professional Development for MEng Students
